def_en: A parody is a humorous piece of writing, drama, or music which imitates the style of a well-known person or represents a familiar situation in an exaggerated way.

def_cn: 戏仿；滑稽（或夸张）地模仿
def_en: When someone parodies a particular work, thing, or person, they imitate it in an amusing or exaggerated way.

def_cn: （对特定事物的）拙劣模仿
def_en: When you say that something is a parody of a particular thing, you are criticizing it because you think it is a very poor example or bad imitation of that thing.
